name: NMT Sitewide moderation
author: Appie Verschoor, NMT

sections.description: NMT Sitewide moderation is a wordpress plugin that provides a wordpress-like comment control screen that show comments of all blogs inside your wordpress multi-site installation. No more blog-switching to moderate comments on different blogs, the switching is done by the plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the NETWORK ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

1.1

Bug fixes * batch-operations now return to the correct screen even when output buffering is off * When de tables get out of sync, allow some failsafe so the comments get handled appropiately

1.2

Come on WordPress, see my release!
